PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_FlowFittingPipeFitting
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Pipe fitting occurrence attributes attached to an instance of IfcFlowFitting.

PropertyDef.Name: InteriorRoughnessCoefficient
PropertyDef.Definition: The interior roughness of the pipe fitting material.

PropertyDef.Name: Color
PropertyDef.Definition:
The color of the pipe fitting.
Note: This is typically used only for plastic pipe fittings. However, it may be used for any pipe fittings with a painted surface which is not otherwise specified as a covering.
